text: (khair ye to ho gaya) phir donon ke donon aage chale yahaan tak ki donon ek ladake se mile to us bande khuda ne use jaan se maar daala moosa ne kaha (ai maaz allaah) kya aapane ek maasoom shakhsh ko maar daala aur vah bhee kisee ke (khauph ke) badale mein nahin aapane to yaqeenee ek ajeeb harakat kee
